attributes.action: Pay those on healthcare related placements a liveable wage whilst on placement
attributes.additional_details: Having to balance a placement as well as a job to be able to afford necessities is near impossible. Work morale and motivation is reduced as it essentially ‘free labour’. The duties carried out by students are those equivalent to a ‘Healthcare Assistant’ and ‘Qualified’ staff member. A training grant has been put into place but this does still not reflect the work Students do whilst on placement.
attributes.background: Those on healthcare related courses are having to work full time hours on no pay other than a ‘training grant’ this makes it extremely difficult to live on a means tested student finance and a grant that is equivalent to a few months work.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555178
